name: reupholster
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to cover a chair or other type of seat with new cloth and fill it again with a soft substance: I have had the chairs reupholstered in a beige tweedy material. She was looking to re-upholster her sofa and couldn't find a fabric that was both luxurious and eco-friendly. Related word
upholster
More examplesFewer examplesIf you take him an old chair he will reupholster it and cover it in a material of your choosing. When money was tight, she made clothes for her children and learned how to reupholster furniture. She has painted the rusted metal black and reupholstered the seat with white velvet.
